title: Tesla’s Solar Range Extender with Starlink prototype could save lives during disasters
summary: Tesla’s recent prototype of a solar range extender trailer with Starlink will be a game-changer for disaster relief. Tesla Germany recently shared...

title: CAPSTONE suffers communications problem
summary: A NASA lunar cubesat mission has lost contact with Earth a day after its deployment, putting into jeopardy its plans to demonstrate the orbit that will be used for later Artemis missions.

title: Northrop Grumman selects Airbus to supply satellite buses for U.S. military constellation
summary: Airbus U.S. Space and Defense will produce 42 satellite buses for the Space Development Agency's Transport Layer Tranche 1

title: Russian astronauts use space station to promote anti-Ukraine propaganda
summary: "The space station is supposed to be a symbol of peace and cooperation."

title: Kongsberg to acquire majority stake in NanoAvionics
summary: Norwegian company Kongsberg Defence & Aerospace will acquire a majority stake in NanoAvionics in a deal that values the smallsat manufacturer at 65 million euros ($67 million).
